original_text: Besides, they get into the habit of being idle and going about from house to house. And not only do they become idlers, but also busybodies who talk nonsense, saying things they ought not to.
korean_text: 또 그들은 게으름을 익혀 집집으로 돌아 다니고 게으를 뿐 아니라 쓸데없는 말을 하며 일을 만들며 마땅히 아니할 말을 하나니

sentences.original_text: Besides, they get into the habit of being idle
sentences.korean_translation: 게다가 그들은 게으름에 빠지는 버릇이 생깁니다

sentences.original_text: and going about from house to house
And not only do they become idlers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 게으름뱅이가 될 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: but also busybodies who talk nonsense
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 쓸데없는 말을 하는 참견꾼들이 됩니다

sentences.original_text: saying things they ought not to
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 해서는 안 될 말들을 하며
